step1.para: Chock wheels.
Disconnect battery.
Remove engine cover for increased access.
Remove front grille.
Remove front bumper.
Drain cooling system.
Remove charge air cooler inlet pipe / hoses.
Remove upper radiator hose.
Disconnect heater hose and overflow hoses at radiator. Reposition hose for access. Include removal of necessary plastic ties.
Disconnect wiring at alternator. Disconnect wiring from coolant sensors to include removal of plastic ties. Reposition harness out of way for access.
Disconnect wire harness support clamps for transmission from front of valve cover. Reposition harness out of way for access.
Remove right side radiator support strut at radiator mount. Remove left side radiator support strut from frame mount.
Remove left side headlight assembly with body panel intact to allow radiator to tilt forward.
Tilt radiator assembly forward for access to fan / clutch.
Remove fan / clutch assembly using special tools (2 people). NOTE: Left hand threads.
Remove fan blade from fan clutch.
Install fan blade to fan clutch. Torque nuts to spec.
Install fan / clutch to fan drive using special tools.

note.para: After installation of fan /clutch assembly, secure loose wires and hoses with plastic ties as needed.

step1.para: Place radiator assembly back to original position.
Install both radiator support struts.
Install headlight assembly with body panel.
Connect wire harness to transmission and valve cover area. Secure harness as needed.
Connect wire harness to alternator and coolant sensors. Secure harness as needed.
Connect heater hose and overflow hose to radiator assembly. Secure hoses as needed.
Install upper radiator hose.
Install charge air cooler inlet pipe / hoses.
Install front bumper.
Fill engine coolant.
Connect battery.
Start engine and check for leaks.
Install front grille.
Install engine cover.
Remove wheel chocks.
Check to see that all wire harness and hoses are secure.
